summary: Simple companion mod with a good looking female nord
descriptionHtml:
This companion is based off of my Aela The Hotress mod, but this one is its own companion so you dont have to change Aela.

She can be found in [size=5]Jorrvaskr[/size] in Whiterun

For manual install simply put the data folder in the skyrim directory

---------
Stats
---------
Level: 15
Health: 190
Magicka: 50
Stamina: 120
Archery: 46
Light Armor: 46
One Handed: 35
Block: 35
Sneak: 25
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Here is a list of the mods I used in the screen shot they are REQUIRED for her to look the same:
Pretty Face Pack by tktk <--REQUIRED
covereyes by mrLenski
Detailed lips by Xenius
Detailed Faces by Xenius
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii <--REQUIRED
-CBBE- by Caliente
Calientes Vanilla Armor for CBBE by Caliente

------------------
Update

Fixed the bow problem, she now has an enchanted hunting bow(15 fire damage). I have also made hair length variations.
author: DrMiller
